name: Banana
description: A potassium-rich fruit with electrical properties. Fast and agile, known for slippery tactics and quick strikes.

attacks.name: Banana Peel
attacks.description: Drops a slippery peel that slows down the opponent.

attacks.name: Potassium Shock
attacks.description: Releases electrical energy from natural potassium.

attacks.name: Quick Strike
attacks.description: A fast attack that usually goes first.

attacks.name: Energy Burst
attacks.description: A powerful electrical attack with reduced accuracy.
